title: Sleeping Together
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Karin-chaaan, Emma-chaaan, where are you~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Kanata-chan, over here~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ah, found Emma-chan~! ....and, Karin-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>....Mmnh, the music room is over there.... zzz....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s so rare to see Karin-chan sleeping, isn’t it~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It seems like she was up late yesterday doing her assignment, she looked like she was going to fall asleep all morning.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Even the usually sexy Karin-chan makes a cute face when she’s sleeping, huh. Kanata wonders if she’ll wake up if Kanata pokes her cheeks? ....Uwah, Karin-chan’s skin is so smooth.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, Kanata-chan, she’ll wake up if you poke her too hard, you know. There’s still time, so let her sleep a little longer, shall we?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Okaaay. Then, Kanata will also sleep. Let’s sleep together, Emma-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>That’s right, the weather is also great, so I guess we can all take a nap together.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fwah, did I fall asleep....? Wait, huh, I remember being with Emma, but since when did Kanata get here?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Fufufu.... Haruka-chaaan.... zzz....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’m so full, I can’t eat anymore~.... zzz....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, I wonder what dreams they’re having.... Wait, it’s already this late!? Emma, Kanata, wake up!! Class is about to start!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
